name: Gravity (itch) (MaskedIntrovert)
description:
What is it?

Gravity is a short puzzle-platformer where the goal is to get through the levels as quickly as you can. Some levels have time bonuses if you solve the puzzles in a more complex manner or get to harder locations.


What's unique about it?

The game centers around using your powers (gravity-based abilities) to solve puzzles. Most levels have several (if not many many ways) to solve them. (My testers beat levels in ways I never even thought of.)
